Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Lake
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to a mechanical problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
